root.data: PRAGMA journal_mode=WAL; PRAGMA wal_autocheckpoint=0; PRAGMA cache_size=50000; CREATE TABLE cache_entries (id CHARACTER(32) PRIMARY KEY, content_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, last_modified DATETIME NOT NULL, last_accessed DATETIME NOT NULL, size UNSIGNED BIG INT NOT NULL, content BLOB NOT NULL);>

data.name: GetEntryById
data.value: SELECT id, content_type, last_modified, last_accessed, size, content FROM cache_entries WHERE id = $id;

data.name: InsertEntry
data.value: INSERT INTO cache_entries (id, content_type, last_modified, last_accessed, size, content) VALUES ($id, $content_type, $last_modified, $last_accessed, $size, $content);

data.name: UpdateEntryLastAccessDate
data.value: UPDATE cache_entries SET last_accessed = $last_accessed WHERE id = $id;

data.name: DeleteLeastAccessedEntries
data.value: DELETE FROM cache_entries WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM cache_entries ORDER BY last_accessed LIMIT $amount);
